get.description: Retrieves a list of orders with filters and pagination.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. The following properties can be added to change filter behavior (_gte,_lte,_lt,_gt). Examples: "createdAt_gte=2018-11-01T02:22:00.667" , "createdAt_lt=2018-11-01"

parameters.name: createdAt_gte
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. Greater than or equal, >=

parameters.name: createdAt_gt
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. Greater than, >

parameters.name: createdAt_lte
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. Less than or equal, <=

parameters.name: createdAt_lt
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. Less than, <

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: Filter orders by update date. The following properties can be added to change filter behavior (_gte,_lte,_lt,_gt). Examples: "updatedAt_gte=2018-11-01T02:22:00.667" , "updatedAt_lt=2018-11-01"

parameters.name: updatedAt_gte
parameters.description: Filter orders by update date. Greater than or equal, >=

parameters.name: updatedAt_gt
parameters.description: Filter orders by update date. Greater than, >

parameters.name: updatedAt_lte
parameters.description: Filter orders by update date. Less than or equal, <=

parameters.name: updatedAt_lt
parameters.description: Filter orders by update date. Less than, <

parameters.name: orderState
parameters.description: Filter orders by its state.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page of results to return.

parameters.name: maxResultsPerPage
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to return in one request, specified as an integer from 1 to 100.

servicePoint.description: DHL Service point data. This property is only defined for Service point deliveries, otherwise is omitted.
DHL Service point data. This property is only defined for Service point deliveries, otherwise is omitted.

commission.description: Commission data object. Older orders may not have this field.

totalValue.description: KuantoKusta commission total value with tax.

get.description: Returns the total number of orders with filters.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. The following properties can be added to change filter behavior (_gte,_lte,_lt,_gt). Examples: "createdAt_gte=2018-11-01T02:22:00.667" , "createdAt_lt=2018-11-01"

parameters.name: createdAt_gte
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. Greater than or equal, >=

parameters.name: createdAt_gt
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. Greater than, >

parameters.name: createdAt_lte
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. Less than or equal, <=

parameters.name: createdAt_lt
parameters.description: Filter orders by creation date. Less than, <

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: Filter orders by update date. The following properties can be added to change filter behavior (_gte,_lte,_lt,_gt). Examples: "updatedAt_gte=2018-11-01T02:22:00.667" , "updatedAt_lt=2018-11-01"

parameters.name: updatedAt_gte
parameters.description: Filter orders by update date. Greater than or equal, >=

parameters.name: updatedAt_gt
parameters.description: Filter orders by update date. Greater than, >

parameters.name: updatedAt_lte
parameters.description: Filter orders by update date. Less than or equal, <=

parameters.name: updatedAt_lt
parameters.description: Filter orders by update date. Less than, <

parameters.name: orderState
parameters.description: Filter orders by its state.

get.description: Retrieves an order by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the order to retrieve.

servicePoint.description: DHL Service point data. This property is only defined for Service point deliveries, otherwise is omitted.
DHL Service point data. This property is only defined for Service point deliveries, otherwise is omitted.

commission.description: Commission data object. Older orders may not have this field.

totalValue.description: KuantoKusta commission total value with tax.

get.summary: Retrieve a single order by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the order to approve.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the order to send.

requestBody.description: The data required to send the order.

products.description: Products for shipping. If the products are not sent, all the products in the order are considered as shipped.

quantity.description: Quantity of the product sent on this order.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the order to cancel.

requestBody.description: The data required to cancel the order.

parameters.name: page

parameters.name: maxResultsPerPage
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to return in one request, specified as an integer from 1 to 100.

parameters.description: Filter offers by automatic import status

parameters.name: isBlacklisted
parameters.description: Filter offers by blacklist status
